wchar_from_mb.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_WCHAR_FROM_MB_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_WCHAR_FROM_MB_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008

00019 #include <cassert>
00020 #include <cctype>
00021 #include <cstddef> // size_t
00022 #include <cstdlib> // mblen
00023 
00024 #include <boost/config.hpp> // for BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME
00025 #if defined(BOOST_NO_STDC_NAMESPACE)
00026 namespace std{ 
00027     using ::mblen; 
00028     using ::mbtowc; 
00029 } // namespace std
00030 #endif
00031 
00032 #include <boost/serialization/throw_exception.hpp>
00033 #include <boost/serialization/pfto.hpp>
00034 
00035 #include <boost/iterator/iterator_adaptor.hpp>
00036 #include <boost/archive/iterators/dataflow_exception.hpp>
00037 
00038 namespace boost { 
00039 namespace archive {
00040 namespace iterators {
00041 
00043 // class used by text archives to translate char strings to wchar_t
00044 // strings of the currently selected locale
00045 template<class Base>
00046 class wchar_from_mb 
00047     : public boost::iterator_adaptor<
00048         wchar_from_mb<Base>, 
00049         Base, 
00050         wchar_t,
00051         single_pass_traversal_tag,
00052         wchar_t
00053     >
00054 {
00055     friend class boost::iterator_core_access;
00056     typedef BOOST_DEDUCED_TYPENAME boost::iterator_adaptor<
00057         wchar_from_mb<Base>, 
00058         Base, 
00059         wchar_t,
00060         single_pass_traversal_tag,
00061         wchar_t
00062     > super_t;
00063 
00064     typedef wchar_from_mb<Base> this_t;
00065 
00066     wchar_t drain();
00067 
00068     wchar_t dereference_impl() {
00069         if(! m_full){
00070             m_current_value = drain();
00071             m_full = true;
00072         }
00073         return m_current_value;
00074     }
00075 
00076     wchar_t dereference() const {
00077         return const_cast<this_t *>(this)->dereference_impl();
00078     }
00079 
00080     void increment(){
00081         dereference_impl();
00082         m_full = false;
00083         ++(this->base_reference());
00084     };
00085 
00086     wchar_t m_current_value;
00087     bool m_full;
00088 
00089 public:
00090     // make composible buy using templated constructor
00091     template<class T>
00092     wchar_from_mb(BOOST_PFTO_WRAPPER(T) start) : 
00093         super_t(Base(BOOST_MAKE_PFTO_WRAPPER(static_cast<T>(start)))),
00094         m_full(false)
00095     {}
00096     // intel 7.1 doesn't like default copy constructor
00097     wchar_from_mb(const wchar_from_mb & rhs) : 
00098         super_t(rhs.base_reference()),
00099         m_full(rhs.m_full)
00100     {}
00101 };
00102 
00103 template<class Base>
00104 wchar_t wchar_from_mb<Base>::drain(){
00105     char buffer[9];
00106     char * bptr = buffer;
00107     char val;
00108     for(std::size_t i = 0; i++ < (unsigned)MB_CUR_MAX;){
00109         val = * this->base_reference();
00110         *bptr++ = val;
00111         int result = std::mblen(buffer, i);
00112         if(-1 != result)
00113             break;
00114         ++(this->base_reference());
00115     }
00116     wchar_t retval;
00117     int result = std::mbtowc(& retval, buffer, MB_CUR_MAX);
00118     if(0 >= result)
00119         boost::serialization::throw_exception(iterators::dataflow_exception(
00120             iterators::dataflow_exception::invalid_conversion
00121         ));
00122     return retval;
00123 }
00124 
00125 } // namespace iterators
00126 } // namespace archive
00127 } // namespace boost
00128 
00129 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_ITERATORS_WCHAR_FROM_MB_HPP
